languages.text: "Вы... тоже мне нравитесь, {name}". {n}С придыханием отвечает Кассия, нежно сжимая вашу ладонь.{/n} "И я боюсь этого. Но не хочу... Не хочу отказываться от этого".

traits.locale_text: "Вы... тоже мне нравитесь, {name}". {n}С предыханием отвечает Кассия, нежно сжимая вашу ладонь.{/n} "И я боюсь этого. Но не хочу... Не хочу отказываться от своих чувств".

languages.text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
languages.original_text: "Вы... тоже мне нравитесь, {name}". {n}С придыханием отвечает Кассия, нежно сжимая вашу ладонь.{/n} "И я боюсь этого. Но не хочу... Не хочу отказываться от этого".

traits.locale_text: "I... have feelings for you as well, {name}." {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice, holding your hand gently.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
"I... have feelings for you as well, {name}." {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice, holding your hand gently.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
"I, uh, have feelings for you as well, {name}." {n}Cassia aspirates as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
"I, uh, have feelings for you as well, {name}." {n}Cassia aspirates as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
"I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."
"I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

languages.text: 「私…私もあなたが好きです、{name}」{n}カシアはあなたの手をそっと握りながら、吐息のような声で言った。{/n}「だけどこの気持ちが私は怖い。でも…諦めたくはありません」
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: 「私…私もあなたが好きです、{name}」{n}カシアはあなたの手をそっと握りながら、吐息のような声で言った。{/n}「だけどこの気持ちが私は怖い。でも…諦めたくはありません」

languages.text: “我……我对你也有感觉，{name}。”{n}卡西娅轻轻握住你的手，以颤抖的声音开了口。{/n}“这些感觉让我很害怕，但我并不想……放弃它们。”
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，对你也有感觉，{name}。”{n}卡西娅轻轻地握住你的手，吸了口气。{/n}“这些感觉让我很害怕，但我并不想……放弃它们。”

languages.text: «Yo... también siento algo por ti, {name}». {n}Cassia susurra mientras toma tu mano en la suya con dulzura.{/n} «Y esos sentimientos me asustan. Pero no quiero... renunciar a ellos».
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... también siento algo por ti, {name}». {n}Cassia susurra mientras toma tu mano en la suya con dulzura.{/n} «Y esos sentimientos me asustan. Pero no quiero... renunciar a ellos».

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich empfinde auch für Euch etwas, {name}", {n}sagt Cassia atemlos, während sie zärtlich deine Hand hält.{/n} "Und diese Gefühle machen mir Angst. Aber ich will sie ... nicht aufgeben."
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich, äh, habe auch Gefühle für Euch, {name}." {n}Cassia atmet aus, während sie sanft deine Hand hält.{/n} "Und diese Gefühle machen mir Angst. Aber ich will sie ... nicht aufgeben."

languages.text: « Je... Moi aussi, j'éprouve des sentiments pour vous, {name}, {n}murmure Cassia en vous prenant tendrement la main.{/n} Et ces sentiments m'effraient. Mais je ne veux pas... y renoncer pour autant. »
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, j'éprouve des sentiments pour vous, {name}.{n}Cassia prend une longue inspiration en vous prenant tendrement la main.{/n} Et ces sentiments m'effraient. Mais je ne veux pas... les abandonner. »

languages.text: "Ben... Ben de sana karşı bir şeyler hissediyorum {name}." {n}Cassia, uysalca elini tutarken sesi hırıltılı çıkıyor.{/n} "Hislerim beni korkutsa da onları göz ardı etmek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I... I have feelings for you as well, {name}," {n}Cassia says in a breathy voice as she gently holds your hand.{/n} "And these feelings frighten me. But I do not want... to give up on them."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Benim de sana karşı hislerim var {name}." {n}Cassia uysalca elini tutarken hırıltılı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "İçimdeki hisler beni korkutsa da, bundan vazgeçmek istemiyorum."
